objects.text:
• 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II Sensor
• 77-Point Fast Autofocus
• Full HD 1080p Video Recording
• Built-in Wi-Fi Connectivity

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled compact mirrorless camera body with premium build quality
• Advanced 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II APS-C sensor for exceptional image quality
• High-precision electronic viewfinder with 2.36M-dot resolution
• Fast autofocus system with 77 selectable AF points
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for easy photo sharing and remote control
• Tiltable 3-inch LCD screen for creative angle shooting
• Full HD 1080p video recording capability at 60fps
• Advanced manual controls with dedicated dials for shutter speed, exposure compensation, and drive modes
• Compatible with Fujifilm's extensive X-mount lens system
• Compact and lightweight design perfect for travel photography
• Film simulation modes that recreate classic Fujifilm styles
• Durable metal top and bottom plates for long-lasting performance

banner_details:
This promotional banner is designed to advertise a high-end camera with a modern and dynamic aesthetic. It is divided into four quadrants with a grid overlay, each featuring a distinct background shade to segment content. The top-left quadrant hosts the brand identity with large, bold "brand_name" and "heading" text. Just below it, the "offer" and "tagline" texts communicate a compelling deal and adventurous message. Feature highlights are listed in the "description" section on the left, while the "price" stands out prominently in a bold, white font. A large "product_image" of the camera overlaps the top-right section. Below that, motivational and time-sensitive messaging is delivered using the "subheading" and "urgency_text". At the bottom left, a bright orange "cta_button" and "cta" invite users to take action.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Navy Blue: #1A3263
- Midnight Blue: #0F1F3D
- Slate Blue: #243B6B
- Bright Red: #D50000
- White: #FFFFFF
- Orange: #FFA500
- Black: #000000
product_color: The product image features the Fujifilm X-T10 camera, which utilizes a sophisticated and sleek color palette dominated by deep matte black (#1A1A1A) with subtle metallic gray highlights (#4B4B4D), creating a professional and modern appearance. The rings on the lens reflect light with a soft blend of graphite hues (#2E2E2E) and silver tones (#C0C0C0), emphasizing the precision of the craftsmanship. Fine details, such as the red lettering (#FF3B3F) and white typography (#FFFFFF), add contrast and visual hierarchy without overpowering the central design. A banner could effectively use this palette to highlight premium quality and technical excellence through strong contrasts and metallic finishes.
